EmailTemplate.name: Pricing Task Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Task {!WRF_Task__c.Name} Pricing Completion – DOA Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The {!WRF_Task__c.Name} has been marked completed. This sub task type indicates that pricing has been created and/or changed. Per our companies Delegation of Authority guidelines a CPM may need to be launched. CPMs are to be launched prior to customer submittal on all customers who:
- Are under (or will result in) a written agreement - Contain rebates (outside of existing GPO approved structures) - Are priced under an existing GPO but pricing/incentives created deviate from the GPO’s approved structure.
If your pricing meets any of this criteria, please be sure to launch a CPM through SalesForce to the necessary DOA approvers. If there is no need to obtain DOA approval, please confirm that the Main Task, {!WRF_Task__c.Parent_WRF_Task__c}'s stage reflects “Pending Award.”
Click here to view the WRF Task: {!WRF_Task__c.Link}
Thank You!
